title: ISic020043. ISic020043
body:
1double axe

1double axe

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after Agostiniani 1977 (IAS I)

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

Double-headed axe (bipennis) sign recurrent as a mark throughout the ancient world. Agostiniani (1977, p.16). In the Elymian ceramics the sign is once painted as a decoration (see Ambrosini 1970, p.464).

bibliography

    Agostiniani 1977 43 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002201 Lejeune 1970 144 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001880 Ambrosini 1968 163 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002189 Tusa 1966 no.8 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001539
    Ambrosini 1970 464 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002187
